constraints.name: path_constraint
constraints.description: 路径长度固定为 K，且路径可以重复经过节点和边
constraints.formal: len(path) = K, path[i] ∈ V, (path[i], path[i+1]) ∈ E

constraints.name: lexicographic_maximization
constraints.description: 路径选择策略是字典序最大化，即每次选择当前可选的最大值
constraints.formal: path[i] = argmax(d[path[i-1], u]) for all u ∈ V and (path[i-1], u) ∈ E

constraints.name: out_degree_bound
constraints.description: 每个节点至少有一个出边
constraints.formal: ∀v ∈ V, ∃u ∈ V such that (v, u) ∈ E

constraints.name: edge_weight_constancy
constraints.description: 每条边的权重在多次通过时保持不变
constraints.formal: d[u, v] is constant for all (u, v) ∈ E
